text.desc: [StartDuel] Apply 1 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count to target and self

text.name: Peck 'em
text.desc:

[StartDuel] Apply 1 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count to target and self

text.name: Peck 'em
text.desc:

[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 10 [Combustion] on self (max 2)
[StartDuel] Apply 1 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count to target and self

text.desc: [StartDuel] Apply 1 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count to target and self
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] If this unit has [ChickenStance], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, Reuse this Coin (once per Skill)

text.name: Mutilating Talons

[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 10 [Combustion] on self (max 2)
[StartDuel] Apply 1 [Combustion] and +1 [Combustion] Count to target and self
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal (([Combustion] on self x 2)% of this Coin's final damage) Wrath damage (max 20%)
[OnSucceedAttackHead] If this unit has [ChickenStance], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, Reuse this Coin (once per Skill)

text.name: Bloodflame Massacre [血炎亂舞]
text.desc:
[WideAreaRampage]
[StartBattle] If this unit has [ChickenStance], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, convert all Coins to [SuperCoin]s
[BeforeUse] At 20 [ChickenFightlust], activate 'Rooster's Rampaging Blades Under the Ensanguined Heaven' instead
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [ChickenStance]
[EndSkill] Gain +2 [Combustion] Count
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] At 50%+ HP, take [Combustion] damage by [Combustion] Potency on self
[OnSucceedAttackHead] At 50%+ HP, take [Combustion] damage by [Combustion] Potency on self
[OnSucceedAttackHead] At 50%+ HP, take [Combustion] damage by [Combustion] Potency on self

text.name: Bloodflame Massacre [血炎亂舞]
text.desc:
[WideAreaRampage]
Deal +1.5% damage for every [Combustion] on self (max 30%)
[StartBattle] If this unit has [ChickenStance], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, convert all Coins to [SuperCoin]s
[BeforeUse] At 20 [ChickenFightlust], activate 'Rooster's Rampaging Blades Under the Ensanguined Heaven' instead
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [ChickenStance]
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 ([Combustion] + [Burst]) on the main target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 20% missing HP on self (max 3)
[EndSkill] Gain +2 [Combustion] Count
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] At 50%+ HP, take [Combustion] damage by [Combustion] Potency on self
[OnSucceedAttackHead] At 50%+ HP, take [Combustion] damage by [Combustion] Potency on self
[OnSucceedAttackHead] At 50%+ HP, take [Combustion] damage by [Combustion] Potency on self
[OnSucceedAttack] Deal (([Combustion] on self + [Combustion] on the main target)% of this Coin's final damage) Gluttony damage against all targets (max 20%)

text.name: Rooster's Rampaging Blades Under the Ensanguined Heaven [血天下鷄舞亂刀]
text.desc:
[WideAreaRampage]
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [ChickenStance]
[WinDuel] Gain 10 [Combustion]
[EndSkill] Consume all [ChickenFightlust]
[EndSkill] At more than 20 [Combustion], consume up to 25 excess [Combustion] and heal ([Combustion] consumed x 2)% HP
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this unit has 20+ [Combustion], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, Reuse this Coin (once per Skill)

text.name: Rooster's Rampaging Blades Under the Ensanguined Heaven [血天下鷄舞亂刀]
text.desc:
[WideAreaRampage]
Deal +3% damage for every [Combustion] on self (max 60%)
Deal +1% damage for every 2% (missing HP percentage on target + missing HP percentage on self) (max 50%)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [ChickenStance]
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 ([Combustion] + [Burst]) on the main target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 20% missing HP on self (max 3)
[WinDuel] Gain 10 [Combustion]
[EndSkill] Consume all [ChickenFightlust]
[EndSkill] At more than 20 [Combustion], consume up to 25 excess [Combustion] and heal ([Combustion] consumed x 2)% HP
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this unit has 20+ [Combustion], or if this unit has less than 50% HP, Reuse this Coin (once per Skill)

[OnSucceedAttack] Deal (20% of this Coin's final damage) Wrath damage against all targets
- If this is the final Coin, heal HP by the amount of damage the above effect dealt

text.name: More Grub for Us
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [ChickenStance] next turn
[WhenUse] If this unit has [ChickenStance], Coin Power +1
[StartDuel] Gain +3 [Combustion] Count (once per turn)

text.name: More Grub for Us
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [ChickenStance] next turn
[WhenUse] If target has 10+ ([Combustion] + [Burst]), Base Power +1
[WhenUse] If this unit has [ChickenStance], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] This Skill deals +1% damage for every 3% HP this unit cumulatively lost in this Encounter (max 30%)
[StartDuel] Gain +3 [Combustion] Count (once per turn)

1071401.name: Bloody Storm of Blades
1071401.desc:
Combat Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up for every 20% missing HP on self (max 3)

Gain [ChickenFightlust] when meeting one of the following conditions: (10 per turn)
- Gain 3 at Clash Start
- Gain 1 when this unit hits with a Base Attack Skill or when this unit takes [Combustion] damage
At less than 50% HP, gain 1 more [ChickenFightlust]
- Gain 5 On Kill

1071402.name: Gamefowl
1071402.desc:
When activating [HeishouCombo], The Lord of Hongyuan Hong Lu gains the following effect as the [HeishouComboCountHonglu] effect:
- On Hit with this unit's Base Attack Skill: Deal 5% of Gluttony damage dealt as Wrath damage

Cannot be Staggered or fall below 1 HP due to [Combustion] damage.

Gain 3 [ChickenStance] and +3 [Combustion] Count in the same turn it Substitutes or Returns in.

1071403.name: Flame Rooster's Death Defiance [炎鳥不死戰]
1071403.desc:
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn.
Then, at the next Turn Start, heal (20 + [Combustion] on self)% HP, and remove all [Combustion] on self (max 49%; once per Encounter)

1071421.name: Backed Against a River
1071421.desc: Turn End: if an ally with the lowest current HP percentage has less than 50% HP, that unit gains 1 [ParryingResultUp] next turn
